sourcesContent:
<template>
    <input type="text"
           class="input"
           :value="value"
           v-on="listeners">
</template>

<script>
    export default {
        props: {
            value: {
                type: String,
                default: '',
            }
        },
        computed: {
            listeners() {
                return {
                    // Pass all component listeners directly to input
                    ...this.$listeners,
                    // Override input listener to work with v-model
                    input: event => this.$emit('input', event.target.value)
                }
            }
        }
    }
</script>

<style>
    @import '../src/assets/InputBar.css';
</style>
